titleStmt.title: Animadversions upon a paper entituled, The speech of the late Lord Russel, &c.
titleStmt.author: Nalson, John, 1638?-1686.
Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.

notesStmt.note: By John Nalson, LL. D.? Cf. Lincoln's Inn Catalogue of pamphlets, no. 1612.

Another work with a similar title, "Animadversions on the last speech and confession of the late William lord Russell, London, 1683," is attributed to Elkanah Settle. Cf. C.E. Brown, Elkanah Settle ... life and works [1910] p. 130.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
